    • fileUploadUsingTagChange

      public boolean fileUploadUsingTagChange(org.openqa.selenium.WebElement elementUploadFile, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement uploadedFileElement, String filePath, String fileName)
      This function will upload a file for the non-input type element, like a windows dialog box to open a file on a webpage. *
      Parameters:
      elementUploadFile - [WebElement]: WebElement on which file needs to be uploaded
      uploadedFileElement - [WebElement]: WebElement after successful upload is completed. Will be used for validation if upload is successful
      filePath - [String] : Location path of the file that needs to be uploaded. For Eg: D:\iAutomateCodeBaseVersion\test-data-files
      fileName - [String]: Name of the file uploaded For Eg: TestCasesConfig.xlsx
      Returns:
      [boolean] true if is file upload is successful
